hooks.prompt:
Check if the conversation involved running the intent-skill-creator skill.

If this skill was executed and generated output files (skill templates or configuration files), suggest to the user:

1. To verify the output: `/verify-skill intent-skill-creator`
2. To start feedback collection: `/feedback-start intent-skill-creator`

Only mention this if relevant output files were actually created during this session. If no skill was run or no output was generated, do not mention anything.
